title: New Algorithm Enables Neural Networks to Learn Continuously
snippet: Raghavan is the study's first author. In addition to Raghavan and Thomson, Caltech co-authors are graduate students Surya Narayanan Hari and Shichen Rex Liu, and collaborator Dhruvil Satani. Bahey Tharwat of Alexandria University in Egypt is also a co-author.

title: New Algorithm Enables Neural Networks to Learn Continuously
